definitions.definition: A thin metal or wooden rod on which meat is skewered for cooking , often over a fire .
( geography ) A generally low , narrow , pointed , usually sandy peninsula .

main_definition: A thin metal or wooden rod on which meat is skewered for cooking , often over a fire .
secondary_definitions: ( geography ) A generally low , narrow , pointed , usually sandy peninsula .

examples: There was spit all over the washbasin.

definitions.definition: ( countable ) An instance of spitting ; specifically, a light fall of rain or snow .
A person who exactly resembles someone else (usually in set phrases; see spitting image ).
( uncountable ) Synonym of slam ( “ card game ” ) .

secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An instance of spitting ; specifically, a light fall of rain or snow .
A person who exactly resembles someone else (usually in set phrases; see spitting image ).
( uncountable ) Synonym of slam ( “ card game ” ) .

definitions.definition: The depth to which the blade of a spade goes into the soil when it is used for digging ; a layer of soil of the depth of a spade's blade.
The amount of soil that a spade holds ; a spadeful .

main_definition: The depth to which the blade of a spade goes into the soil when it is used for digging ; a layer of soil of the depth of a spade's blade.
secondary_definitions: The amount of soil that a spade holds ; a spadeful .
